## Experiment path
```{r, echo=FALSE}
str_filter(experiment[[1]]$file_data$filename_edf, '(^.+/[[:digit:]]+)/[[:digit:]]+.edf')[[1]][2]
```

## Dwells

```{r}
dwell_histogram(experiment)
```
